content.detailedDescription: See above statement
I was looking out side and saw a goldish color disc shape and ask my cousin and he siad that its in our head.Nobody believed me saw im telling you about it.It was miles from the church too!
content.summary: Disc shape and not that bright , but not noisy.

content.detailedDescription: I was speaking to my husband on the cell phone as he was returning from work just shortly after 8pm. my husband yelled in the phone "what is that? what the hell is that?" just by his emotions, i knew he was startled and asked him where he was. he stated just down the road from our house. i looked in my large south window (overlooking our driveway) to find 3 large amber looking orbs in a linear fashion just above tree top height that initially lasted approx 10 sec but then would disappear and reappear. immediately after seeing the orbs i noticed just northwest there was a beautiful display of sequenced flashing white smaller lights. these lights lasted only about 30 seconds at the most and they looked to be much higher in altitude and consumed a large portion of the sky. these lights could not have been jets as they have several lights on the crafts. the lights that i saw were many singular separate bright lights that were indeed in some sort of sequence. i couldn't tell if the lights came from an extremely large craft or many smaller ones. my eyes then gravitated back to the tree line to later find more orbs returning. these orbs would fade and reappear sometimes in the same location. the total sighting lasted approx 30 minutes. my husband got to watch most of the episode outside but i was inside with my very scared and startled children. they witnessed this as well. i spoke to law officials and they told me that they were military jets dropping flares. we do not have an active base in our area and i almost never see military jets over our skies. never seen or heard of this before. later, i asked my husband what he saw on his way home and he said that he saw 3 bright lights in a "v" formation that hovered and was without any sound. he said that it looked to be the size of a house. do flares hover and relight in the same location even minutes after they disappear? i'm confused and would love to know what i saw. this was such a surreal event, i'm still struggling to believe what i saw but i am convinced that what i saw was not from around here. tried to capture this on my digital camera but did not pick up images very good.
content.summary: Weird lights/orbs in northern indiana

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 7:35 p.M. on 3-6-08. i was walking my dog in the signal hill neighborhood of millard, a suburb of omaha nebraska. we had stopped for a moment and i looked up to see if the clouds were coming in. i could see the stars, and one of the "dippers" (i'm not sure which one it was, big or little), and a small plane flying off in the distance. just as i was looking at the sky, a perfectly sharp edged triangle shape with  a distinct white border and completely filled in with individual white lights lit up for a moment then went black. this happened as quickly as someone flipping a light switch on and off, but after it went black i could still see smaller, dimmer lights at the three corners of the triangle, and could see the black outline of the object against the sky before i lost sight of it.

i live very close to offut air force base and my first thought was that it was the stealth, but i don't believe the stealth would be covered with numerous, individually discernible white lights (almost like led's) with a solid white border. it was not moving, but appeared to remain stationary.

my guess is that it was very large and very high up, maybe about the height a commercial airliner flies. it was not directly overhead, but was off in the distance, but the odd thing was that i could see it in such sharp detail. as i mentioned, when it lit up, i could see the dozens or more individual lights on it when it lit up, it wasn't just a solid glow. i wondered if the people in the small plane had seen it also. it happened so quickly that i didn't really have time to react. i lost sight of it when my dog pulled me on her leash. after that my dog and i just finished our walk and went home and i told my wife that i thought i might have seen a ufo, and told her about it.
content.summary: Triangular object in the night completely covered in individual white lights lit up momentarily then went black leaving a black outline

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were driving south on california route 505 as we drove i noted an unusual light in the sky. the light was a soft gold/white light that was stationary in the night sky. i mentioned the light to my friend and we discussed what it could be. as we neared the light we notice that it was in fact three circular gold/white lights joined (more or less) together to form a circle. i stopped the car on the side of the road and the object was just stationary near the side of the road, but out in an open field. i looked at the car clock and it was 1:12 am.

my friend had a digital camera so i told her to take a photo. she fumbled around looking for the camera in her purse, it was dark in the car, so i turned on the interior lights. she found the camera, but had trouble getting it turned on (she was a bit excited). she finally got ready, and as she opened the car door the object moved from where it was to over the car - we lost sight of it as she got out. when she was completely out of the car she said that the object was a long ways away, but i told her to take the picture anyway. she took one photo and the object disappeard into the night sky (it became a very small dot very fast).

my husband is a mufon field investigator and was very excited about this.
content.summary: Three gold/white circular objects joined together

content.detailedDescription: I went out the backdoor of our house (located in la mirada, ca) at about 8:30 pm on january 10, 2008 and to my left i noticed different colored lights on a very large object slowly moving past our house. i thought why is that blimp so low to the ground and it sure has a lot of colored lights. i only saw the last half of the object because our rooftop blocked the front part of the object. it was traveling from the west towards the east. our 2 dogs were out in the backyard with me and one of them barked at this object but the other one did not notice. well the object bothered me so i went back into the house but curiosity got the best of me and i went out the front door and on to the front porch. the object must have made a u-turn because it's heading towards our house. it had a very bright white light which appeared to be coming from the bottom of the object and it was scanning the ground like it was looking for someone or something. i thought how odd that this blimp was flying so low to the ground. it was using some sort of searchlight to find whomever. it got closer to our house to where it was almost overhead and the bright light was now shining on our front lawn. just then a car coming down our street came to a complete stop just to the left of our house. i assumed that the driver must be seeing what i was seeing. i never heard any noise coming from the object and that was another reason why i thought it was a blimp. i was never able see the object's shape but by the placement of the different colored lights it appeared to take on the shape of a blimp. i saw it for probably 5 seconds when i was in the backyard and was initially taken back by the size of the object and the fact it was extremely low to the ground. when i was on the front porch my observation was probably about 15 to 20 seconds and the only thing that my eyes could actually focus on was that extremely bright white light. the closer the white light came towards the porch that was enough for me and i quickly went back into the house. i immediately went to my roommate's bedroom to tell her about the blimp and asked if she wanted to see it. she said that she was tired and was going to bed.  i never went back outside that night because it bothered me alot. i'm now convinced that it was not a blimp nor a helicopter. what it was i don't know but i do wonder if i'll ever see it again. if i do, i hope someone else would be there to witness it with me.
content.summary: Large object with colored lights moving slowly at a height lower then a helicopter would circle around

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of feb. 26, 2008 at 8:55 in the evening mst, i was driving east bound near sheridan lake,co ( near the kans.- co. border on hwy96 ) when i saw a very  bright yellow-orange light in the sky to the north-northeast of me.It was nearly the same color as the headlights on  a car. it appeared to rotate toward me and then away (rotating from east to west),lasting for five seconds, and then disappeared. the pressence of anything that bright immediately got my attention. i checked the time, then used my hand held up to the driverside window to measure this lights exact elevation .It was two hands up from the horizon. several minutes passed as  i continued to seach the dark moonless sky for this strange light.Then as suddenly as it had appeared the first time, it was back in almost the same location for maybe two seconds. as soon as it disappeared, another light the same color appeared almost a finger length  away to the east and was there for approximately five seconds when a series of five lights appeared one at a time in a straight line to where the first light had been. this series of lights were of the same color and appeared as flashes and had no rotation  as the other lights had. at first i thought it could be a helicopter using a seach light but quickley ruled  that out when i couldn't se any  marker lights.I thought it could  be an airplane doing cloud seeding, but there were no clouds and again there were no marker lights . i was going to garden city, ks from golden ,co. at least 20 times per year i make the same trip and have for at least 20 years. this is the first time i have ever seen  anything comparable to this and would like to learn what it was and if any one else saw these lights.
content.summary: A yellow-orange light appeared  followed by a second like -colored light with 5 rapidly appearing lights in a direct line to the first lightr

content.detailedDescription: Thursday, march 6th at around 7:45 pm i was on my college campus with a friend of mine walking towards my car when i looked up to the sky towards the east and i noticed 7 or 8 slow moving objects low in the sky, it was a crystal clear night and i could see every star in the sky.  at first i could not tell what the objects were at all, i wasnt sure if what i was seeing was the reflection of light off of birds in the distance or firefly's or what these things were, then again, ive never seen fireflys in march up in maine.  but as the objects slowly came closer i realized that they were deffinetly some sort of craft in the sky that flashed white lights. there was no red lights or any other lights on these objects.  i could not tell if they were small airplanes or helicopters, but they seemed to be relatively close to the ground, my best estimate would be somewhere around 5 or 10 thousand feet, but i am no expert on that.  the objects made no type of formation in the sky and made no noise that we could hear at all. they seemed to be floating slowly along heading west. im not sure if weather balloons or satelites can travel together, but whatever we saw in the sky was deffinetly a group of objects traveling together, making no noise, pulsating white, they seemed to be smaller in size, about the size of how a star looks but deffinetly in our atmosphere and fairly low to the ground.  the whole event lasted about 4 or 5 minutes i would say and the objects simply went out of view over the tree line.  i am 23 years old, and i have always been observant to airplanes and objects in the sky, and i have never witnessed or observed anything like this before.  it was the strangest thing ive ever seen and i have been thinking about it since the time i witnessed this.  i emailed our local news to see if they had any explanation for the phenomenon that my friend and i witnessed in the sky, they did not return my email and i have not heard anything else about this.  there is a jetport about 5 miles away from my college as well as the maine medical center, so i am accustomed to seeing and hearing helicopters and airplanes fly over my apartment and college quite frequently, but these objects were different and seemed to be coming from the ocean and heading west, as i live in portland maine, right near the water. i am sure there must be some sort of explanation for this, but it was very creepy and they were certainly unidentified flying objects.  i would be thrilled to find out what these things were.
content.summary: 7 or 8 floating flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving home i looked up and saw it.  it wouldn't appear in my cell phone camera, i went in the house to get a better one, when i came back, it was gone
content.summary: Looked like a plasma type?

content.detailedDescription:
I feel a little odd writing this, as i never thought that i would encounter anything of this type in my lifetime, but i am hopefully seeking others who may have legitimately witnessed this occurrence to prove the sanity of my wife and i both. 

at 5:55 pm cst my wife and i were walking when we saw what appeared to be a straight horizontal line at a 30 degree angle from where we stood emitting a bright white light with a soft red-like center.  initially we looked up because it simply looked like really bright stars linked together, while the sun was just starting to start to set.  the sighting appeared to be within 5-10 miles of where we were at the time.  within the following 20 seconds we saw the item rise slowly into the sky yet diminish in size rather quickly, as if it were moving away from us.  the object produced no audible sound, no smoke or trails.  within the 20 second duration the object simply vanished as if it left our atmosphere.  the sky was clear without a single cloud in the sky.  we stood there and simply couldn't believe what we saw.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft with bright lights seen leaving atmosphere at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the yard walking around my car and decided to look up.  i have started looking up at the sky at night, because there is something definitely going on in the sky. it kinda makes you feel like you are going a little crazy if you are the only one who sees it and tries to convince someone else.  i decided would be better to always have a witness near by.    anyway, i looked up and saw once again the star like objects.  this time there were two of them  and they appeared to be traveling  parallel to  each other heading east. on other occasions we (my family andi)  have seen these strange objects travel south and southeast.  i called my family outside once again to come and look, be a witness and they saw it and  then the objects disappeared instantly. it is kind of hard to describe. the objects do in fact look like stars.  imaging looking up at the big dipper (by example) and then seeing two of the stars take off in same or different directions.  i have been noticing these star like objects for the last two months now.  i have other family members who stay in the same vacinity who  have seen these objects and other things in the sky between 7pm and 4am.  we all live in northeast tx and all are working professionals.
content.summary: Two star like objects ran parallel traveling east and then just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down bear lake drive by two lakes,while a storm was just brewing.Lots of lighting with the sun was still out,going south.Right in the storm clouds and lighting,very brightly lit from the sun.A very long straight,black object caught my attention.I stopped the van to get out,for a better look...As did several other cars.About 10-15 people just stared with the wonder i was seeing and feeling.As far as we could see this jet black object,i'd say 5-maybe25 miles long,straight as an arrow.I really cant't say it was a solid object,it appeared like a huge split in the storm clouds and i could see the blackness of outer-space,very clearly with storm clouds and lightning all around,not any of the storm interfering with the split in the sky.My heart was pounding,thinking it was the end of the world.This object or split was huge,people must be able to see it for miles,as far as we all could see it,straight,black,perhapsa hundred miles or more,i could see no end.I stared at the blackness,and thought i should be able to see some stars through this splitting of the atmosphere,but saw only blackness.Now i choked some words out to the man closest to me"maybe it's the end,the old man might be coming down.He said,yeah...Maybe...Maybe you're right.By this time 10-15 cars had pulled over to look in awe.Iwas thinking of what i was going to say to god of a confession of my past bad doings,you've got to understand how powerful this split or object was.It seemed everyone should be able to see it.Straight black looking like it might even circle the earth...As faras i could see...North to south.After 10 minutes the storm clouds started to fill it in,and now for the first time it looked like a solid object as the storm clouds swirled around it,like it was lifting up away from earth,the clouds showed edges as more clouds looked like they are being sucked across the black surface...As it slowly liftedup and away.Now some 20-30 people watched as it pulled the storm clouds across it till it was gone.We shrugged our shoulders and everyone left to go home to tell others of the massive black object,and no one believed anything i told them,but the people there know,and wonder.
content.summary: Black...5-25 miles long...Straight across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from san marcos, tx to austin,tx on i35 north and noticed a very bright white pulsating light. it looked like a light from the top of a radio tower but it was not attached to a tower and it was moving. it actually gave me chills because i have never seen anything like it before. i first noticed it around buda, tx and was actually able to keep an eye on it until i made it into austin (about 10 minutes). once i made it into austin i pulled over to see if i could get a better view of it but it then disappeared behind a building and i could not find it again after that. it seemed to be moving pretty slow going south. i do not believe it was a plane because a plane passed near by the object and it looked completely different. it was flying at a higher altitude than the plane but from my perspective the object looked a bit larger than the plane so it had to be pretty big. the sphere would completely light up, this was very bright, and slowly dim back down to the point where it could not be seen until it lit up again. i have been hearing about all of the ufo sightings in texas and figured i would report this because it was something i have never witnessed in austin skies my entire life of living here.
content.summary: Large sphere pulsating white light

content.detailedDescription:
Was traveling out of sacramento on hwy80.  stopped.  it was about 4:30 pm. took a look at the clouds being blown around by the wind.  son was with me and he was the one that noticed the three dics going in the opposite direction of the clouds.  he pointed them out to me.  i also saw them.

one was larger than the other two.

wondered if anyone else had seen them also?

nohotos were taken.
content.summary: Noticed 3 discs, one larger than the other two going against the moving clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I do not recall this first hand; this was told to me by my brother in law, who is a retired lt gen (af).  i also was in the air force, and was a pilot for 14 yrs.  around 1960 e or ne of portales, nm, a disc went down in a lake.  it was reported to cannon afb, where my brother in law was stationed.  it was retrieved and taken to a hangar there; he stated there was a "black" hangar there.  he stated there had been other retrievals from the western united states sent there; the final destination was to be either groom lake or wright-patterson afb.  anyway, after some preliminary study before it was sent out, the disc suddenly flew out of the hangar and out of sight.  i have searched for others who grew up in this area, as i had, to confirm the story from the civilian side.  my brother in law, although not directly connected to the most famous incident in nm, did confirm to me the essentially accurate portrayal of the roswell incident.  of course this by itself does not mean much; added to the other witnesses statements it does build a stronger case.  if anyone readint this can shed light on the 1960 incident please report on this site.
content.summary: Disc went down in lake in nm; retrieved by cafb.  disc escaped days later

content.detailedDescription:
Me and two of my friends were heading back to montclair. it was 3 am, we were heading west on 4th st. it was january 1st, 1996. it was windy out. very quiet night, not a soul to be found outside ( i noticed this since earlier). lots of leaves blowing in the wind. we had our windows down, driving west on 4th st, approaching mountain avenue, which runs north and south. as u approach mountain there is a large strip mall named ontario plaza. on the south east corner. the way it used to look (since then it has been rebuilt and the layout of the place is now different). the parking lot was along 4th st and curved down on mountain st. so the parking lot was occupying the western most area of the southwest corner, this allowed us to see wat was going on, about a block down mountain before even getting to the light signal. well as i was saying, we approached mountain and something caught our attention. looking across the parking lot and across mountain (south bound side) there is a small fire station. its seems like an old fashion building. brick and only big enough to hold maybe 2 trucks. we look above the firehouse to see a large disc shape object with a center metalic strip that wrapped around the main object. that strip had small circle lights that were slowly revovling with the strip around the main object. 
we continued thru the intersection at a very slow pace. (no other cars or people are any where to be seen). we cross the intersection and stop about 20 feet over the crosswalk line(we are looking south directly north from the object). we are in the left lane and all of us are speaking to eachother about if we are all seeing the same thing ,, and we all agreed what we saw was a ufo. we sat there for like 4 minutes. in that time it was just floating there immediately over the fire house, this thing was very low! if someone at the fire house seen it they could have actually thrown a rock and hit it, thats how low it was. looked like it was doing something or checking something out at that firehouse. it seemed like it didnt even care that we were staring at it. it had to have clear veiw of us. it had no noise. not one sound came out of it. no smoke, nothing! 
then im pretty sure it saw us or something because we were all pretty freaked out and were screaming to eachother to figure out wat it was. it suddenly began to move across mountain heading east. it was over the parking lot now, heading southeast. we turned around and went south on mountain. we entered the parking lot of the ontario plaza, and continued to follow it. it kept in a southeasterly direction. once it floated over the buildings which were fairly small one story buildings, it started over the neighborhood. there are alot of trees and it went out of sight. it never once took off at a fast speed nor did it look or go in our direction. our observation of the lights is that it seemed like they were used as eyes of the object .. slowly scanning the area around its location. we were all pretty scared , we immediately new that we saw was not from our world. we were in disbelief! we drove home and promised eachother to never forget wat we saw.
content.summary: Silver disc with a rounded middle shape, circular lights wrapping around the center area, with the center  slowly revolving in a circular motion around the disc

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving to everette, wa to pick up my step-daughter.  we were traveling down interstate 90 going west.  i was on the passenger side of the vehicle laid back reading a book.  i looked to my right and saw a strange dark object in the clouds.  my first thought was "that's a strange dark spot in the clouds."  i ignored it and went back to reading.  i saw a streak out of the corner of my eye.  i looked to see what it was and saw a new cloud in front of me with the same dark spot.  this time i took a picture.  since then, i have been having some weird occurances happening lately.  i am fully awake in my bed, but cannot move.  a dark silhouette figure with a pear shaped head walks up to the side of the bed i am laying on.  he touches my forehead.  the whole time, i can see the alarm clock.  when the silhouette touches my forehead, i come out of the frozen state but two hours have passed.
content.summary: I sighted a u.F.O. in montana and possible close encounters since

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were going out to feed my horses on march, 06, 2008 at 8:06 pm and as we were driving through the country i saw three redish/orangish lights above a field. i said to my wife what in the world is that?

she said stop and let's watch, i stopped and the lights were there and then they faded off. we continued to watch with the car turned off and they reappeared but this time they were seperated from each other. then they faded off one at a time and a few seconds later they reappeared all three together again. we continued to wathe them and they seperated again and would fade on and off one by one and appeared to be moving away to the north.

we decided to continue to my horses and they are about 5 miles east of the area of the sightings. we were almost at the farm where my horses are and my wife screemed for me to stop. i stopped and the light had reappeared again only closer. i remembered that she had her cell phone with a camera and i said take a picture!

she was trying to get the camera ready and the lights were three together with white lite this time and one off to the left taht was just reddish/orangish, as we were watching the lights went from a horizonital pattern to an angle and started to move towards us and my wife got scared and screamed go! go! they are coming towards us! i didn't move i sat there watching and the stopped and hovered in one spot then faded off slowly and the the one to the left faded off. when i use the term faded i'm not referring to fading like moving away i'm talking about like when you use a dimmer switch and dim the lights slowly. we continued to wath the lights continue to come and go until the finally got to far off and faded off. the whole thing lasted about 40 minutes long and left us really excited and a little freaked out. i know what we saw and they were not planes or hot air or weather baloons.
content.summary: My wife and i saw several redish/orange lights moving and fadind in and out.

content.detailedDescription:
I had noticed some unusual contrails and was observing them on this clear night for about 2 to 3 minutes when i suddenly observed a long thin object (perhaps 400 feet x 20 feet wide) with 3 dim pinkish or amber lights perhaps 1000 feet up moving in a due south direction at about 600 to 800mph. the object was slightly askew, maybe 10 to 15 degrees, but moving in straight course. a grey solid surface was evident. there was no sound. i lost sight of it as it passed over a neighbors roof top. my initial response was "what in the hell was that?". i have lived near jfk and laguardia airports all my life and have never seen anything like it. it left me with a very uneasy feeling.

fast forward to last night. 3/7/08.

this was the first night since my encounter where the sky was again clear.
i looked to the same area expecting to see nothing when suddenly i observed 2 whitish / yellowish relatively bright lights moving north to south again at a very fast rate of speed. another set followed about 5 minutes later. these were completely different from what i observed the first evening. these actually looked as if they might be some sort of huge spot lights, but unlike any i have seen before.
a half hour later i returned to my yard to have a smoke and to my complete amazement observed 5 bright whitish, yellow lights in a triangular / delta formation (one light in front and 2 on each side) heading from east to west, and again at a very fast rate of speed and silent. this was again different from the other observations. at this point i'm thinking this must be something being projected from somewhere ground based. there is no way i'm the only one who has observed this. no way. i began to think if tonight's observation may have been a way by someone to cover up what i observed the first night. while tonight's observation left me with the feeling that it could be something domestically projected, my original sighting was clearly unearthly.
one odd thing was that after tonight's first observation i went to use my cell phone which i had just fully charged and it was completely dead.
 i have no idea what is going on here, but it's all starting to make feel terribly stupid. i'm afraid to talk about it and the few times i have i was met with understandable disbelief and sneers. if tonight's lights turn out to be some supermarket grand opening, or movie debut i would feel dumb, but ultimately much better about everything.
i wish this could all be logically explained to me.
content.summary: 3 dim pinkish lights / grey back ground / silent & fast moving north to south on slightly skewed angle.

content.detailedDescription:
i have not personally seen this, but three different co-workers on two nights in a row have seen orange lights in the sky to the west of where we work. the first man described the two orange lights a bit aways from each other, then they moved in together and disappeared. 
   the other two men saw these same lights the next night together, but they said there was three, disappeared and reappeared before disappearing finally.
i'm pretty sure the first man only told me about his sighting, so i doubt the  
three are trying to trick me.
   finally, right after the two men saw the lights, another co-worker who has a radio told me that several people in the city were calling into the radio station about the lights.
   both sightings happened around the same time of night(breaktimes) so i'll be watching the sky around that time next shift with my video camera in hand...It may be nothing, but i thought i'd tell you...
content.summary: Lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I(chris) was in front yard(faces east) about 8:30pm on dec. 25, 2007. i looked up in eastern sky and saw a bright light. it moved left and right. i looked at stars and they werent moving. i went into house and asked wife, elaine, to come outside. 
i(elaine) went to front yard and saw a gold light in eastern sky and south of moon. it moved back and forth and came forward, spinning.. there was a white haze around it.
  we stood in front yard looking into eastern sky.We thought it was a bright star but it moved back and forth and came forward and was spinning. it was moving parallel with the moon. (and moon was in the beginning waning stage) we couldnt get telescope  or binoculars to focus.
it was cold.  mr eakins mother and sister plus 2 neighbors also saw it.
the bright light was about the 4pm angle. it was a clear night. the round object gradually rotated and hovered. there was a red,steady yellow light .   finally it was too cold to be outside so we went in about 11;30p
content.summary: Bright light,w/halo ,hover,spin,back/forth/forward,

content.detailedDescription: Was taking photos of dramatic aurora event near prudhoe bay alaska. using a digital camera. i was not looking through the viewfinder, but was panning the sky, taking a series of photos in rapid succession. a week later when viewing the pictures this one was the only one with anything other than the aurora on it. the temperature was -30 degrees fahrenheit, severe clear sky conditions. the aurora was extremely bright. i did not look in the exact direction of the photos as i was taking them. the sky was so full of auroral event i was basically just holding the camera over my head and panning it from left to right, and jumped back in my vehicle as it was pretty cold.I have had this photo as my screen saver photo, and everyone seeing it has comments, however they finally convinced me to send it to someone for evaluation. it is not a water drop on the lens or my finger etc. i have no clue what it is. comments have ranged from an "orb", to a supernova. one of my co-workers who is a retired air force radar operator is convinced it is a ufo of some kind. thanks for your time.
content.summary: Took several photos of aurora event this showed up on one of the exposures

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were returning to cedar key, flo. in a rental car . we had been to near atlanta, georgia cking to see if our lumina van was fixed yet.It wasn't. it was about dark ( approx. 9;20 pm)and we were not far down cr347 headed toward cedar key and toward fowlers bluff. we saw a ufo hovering just above the pine trees. my husband said do you see what i see? i said yes, a ufo! i couldn't believe my eyes. i could see plainly that it had square windows accross it approx. 5 or 6 and it was foggy inside or like it was lite with floresent lights but i didn't see any body in the windows. i can't tell you how scared i was as we went under it. my husband turned off the headlights and then turned them back on again and it lite up with colored lights and came down behind us and appeared to land on the road. my husband asked me to turn around in the seat and look back to confirm it was there because he saw it in his rear view mirror too, but i could see it in my rear view side mirror and i was scared stiff and couldn't move, he yelled so hard at me that i turned around and looked and it was there. he drove like a mad man, doing way over the speed limit to fowlers bluff where we took the circle drive around and back to the road again. we saw a truck flying past from the way we had come and we proceded to follow it, feeling theres safety in  numbers, but we couldn't even catch up. i am certain they saw it too. i tried to use my cell phone i called my son in indiana and the answering machine came on, i heard some peeps sort of like sos sounds and then lots of scratchy interference, i felt i was being monortered by someone, i left a message but it cut me off. the next day when i reached my son he said he heard all those odd sounds and just erased it. i wish he had kept it . well thats it.
content.summary: We saw it hovering just above the pine trees. it was approx. 50 ft. accross with square windows.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished repairing the brakes on my girlfriends mom's car.  my girlfriend and i went for a test drive down the road.  i was going north down 250 e in jasper county indiana about 1 mile from my house.  we turned around to head back home after test driving the brake repair.  as soon as i turned the car around to head south, we stopped and were overwhelmed by what we seen in the eastern sky.  there were 3 sets of orange lights in a triangle pattern.  each set of lights had 3 lights in a horizontal row, totalling 9 lights.  each set of 3 lights were perfect spheres that had even distance between them. almost immediately the lights started dimming and going away, starting with the 3 lights at the top point.  they dimmed from left to right one at a time.  then the bottom left point of the triangle started dimming in the same process, left to right one at a time.  finally the right point of the triangle started dimming one at a time left to right.  this process lasted under a minute.  the lights were very bright, definatly orange, and perfectly spaced between the three points of the triangle.  the size of the triangle patter was very large.  i would say each point of the triangle was at least 100 yards apart. it was way to massive to be one craft and i assumed it was 3 different crafts aligning to form a perfectly shaped triangle.  it was truely an amazing sight.  at this point we pulled the car off the side of the road and sat there to discuss what we had just seen.  we were nervous, excited, and a little frightened from what we had seen.  never had we seen anything even close to this before.  as we sat there we then seen a small cluster of dim white lights in the sky twinkling and almost seemed to be chasing each other around.  they were to the southeast of where we seen the triangle pattern of lights.  these lights also dimmed and disappeared.  a few minutes later another set of three orange lights appeared to the south of the spot where the triangle pattern of lights was and it dimmed and disappeared.  almost as soon as it dimmed another orange set of three lights appeared to the east of that one and then dimmed and disappeared.  this went on between these two sets of orange lights about 5 times in about 10-15 minutes.  after sitting for about an hour total, we went on home since the lights seemed to have stopped.  this is by far the most pecuilar thing both my girlfriend and myself have ever seen in the sky.  i have nothing to compare it too.  i will be continuing to watch the sky over the next few nights to see if i can catch any other unexplainable lights like these in the area.
content.summary: Three groups of three orange lights in a triangle pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting 1: tintagel area. big object, very noisy, and low.  sounded like a plane but moved very slowly, couldnt make out its exact shape but what i did find strange was the lighting. one white light at the front and 8-12 lights on what would be the rear edges of the wings running the width of the object in a perfectly straight line.  all lights were in white apart from the one on the right which was red.  none of the lights pulsated or flashed.  no tail light which seemed to give it a triangular shape. i would estimate the size about the same as a military hercules type plane and could have been just that, but i have never seen these illuminations on a plane before. was moving approx north then banked west. not sure if it was a plane or not so i thought best to mention it.

sighting 2:
late sept 2007. st.Teath. out watching the stars at about 11.30 pm, saw a single ball of high intesity white light heading in my direction. very fast, silent and very near to the ground. it made me instictively duck down as it got near. i would estimate 25-30 feet from the ground.  scared the life out of me.  about the size of a large beachball, no idea what it was. sighting lasted only a few seconds. clear sky, good weather. headed north out towards the sea, went out of sight in seconds and i had a long field of view from where i was standing

sighting 3. st. kew.  as above but early eve in march (10th or 11th?) 2007 at about 6.45pm. sighting lasted under 10 seconds.  nice weather, very little cloud, about 1 hour before sunset at a guess. 2 white balls of light side by side appeared to be touching each other but only just. looked just like what i saw later in the year (in sighting 2) but heading west, again low and very fast, no noise. these two objects seemed to fade out and dissapear as i watched them. left me very confused.

i cant express how bright these balls of light were, they reminded me of firework intensity only more constant and much more pure.  really hard to put into words. anyone else in the southwest seen them? please contact me at davecat440@aol.Com as i would love to know what is going on.
content.summary: 3 sightings in cornwall uk over the last year

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday, march 26th around 9:30 p.M.,i was driving into my driveway in rural north florida, when i noticed a beautiful,golden orb that looked much like a large venus, or saturn or star, standing in the south sky. it was a clear stary night and i could see many stars and planets, but this was about 5 times the size of the largest stars visable. i quickly jumped out of the car to get a better view of the magnificent sight! 

as i stood perfectly still watching this golden orb, it made a quick short horizontal movement back and forth. then to my astonishment, another beautiful orb exactly like this one came zipping out of nowhere and stood next to the other orb. for a few seconds neither of them moved, then suddenly they both began to move quickly back and forth in a rocking movement much as if they were dancing with each other. with another quick movement the one to the right zipped out of sight. the movement was much faster then that of a shooting star and i barely caught a glism of a light trail for a split second.

i quickly ran inside to call my family out to see the awesome sight, but when we came back out, both golden orbs were gone!
content.summary: Two golden star like spheres standing still for a moment, then rapidly rocking back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home tonight.  we pulled up to an intersection just west of in 114 and in 15 on 114 in indiana about 35 miles west of ft. wayne and about 2 to 3 miles east of disko.  we were facing south and looked off to the west southwest.  it was hard to tell distance, but it definitely didn't look far off maybe 7 to 10 miles.  there were 6 stationary bright lights in the sky.  there were two rows of three lights and they were positioned as if they were on a boomerang that was tilted forward slightly towards the viewer. as shown below...


      *                                      *    
                          *
                                                       *                                         *
                                                                            *

we came to a stop and then they disappeared quickly one at a time.  the lights definitely didn't accelerate.  they were there and then they were gone.  from the time the first one disappeared until they were all gone was a matter of seconds.  but none of them left at the same time.  everyone disappeared individually.  they left in the sequence to the above figure...


    1                                      2                                                  6
                          4                            5                  3

when i first viewed it i thought it might be a refueling tanker out of grissom air force base down around bunker hill/kokomo area.    they don't usually fly in that area, but they do training over our general area, so it wouldn't be out of the question to see a plane in that area.  but there were too many lights and no strobe lights on the wing tips to reveal an aircraft.  there are no cell phone or other towers in that area of the sky that could possibly give the illusion of lights disappearing.  there also was no movement.  none side to side or towards or away from us.  it was hard to believe.  i watch a lot of the ufo hunters and ufo files on the history channel and usually am a skeptic.  if i hadn't seen this with my wife, i'm not sure i would have believed it other wise.  it was quite an amazing experience.  i just wish i would've had a video or photo camera with me.
content.summary: 6 stationary bright lights instantly disappearing one at a time

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed, i was only around 10 or 11 at the time.  i woke in the middle of the night and heard a deep pulsating sound.  not really noisy or loud, just this low deep sound that i'll never forget but am at at a loss to really describe, maybe something like noises from a power plant or something, like electricity??? and it may have been imagination but it sounded like a rotating sound??  we had some woods and a park directly in back of my backyard and i remember thinking it had something to do with the street lights that were in the park or something. anyway, i just remember laying in bed and listening to it for a while, and i just remember it scaring me, but not really knowing why, and just waiting for the noise to go away and trying to make myself go to sleep.  the next morning i woke to my mom yelling for me to come to the back porch and look at the yard, she was all excited.  when i looked outside there were three circular places on the grass that were like matted down.  one in the front nearer toward my house and two behind that one- they were in a triangular formation.  it totally freaked me out.  my mom was going on about how aliens had landed and was joking about it and i told her what i had heard that night while in bed, and i started getting really scared.  she basically just teased about it and told me it was nothing and not to worry about it.  well, she basically put me at ease, because that was the age when my mom was still right about everything and could protect me from anything.  anyway, years later, when i started hearing about crop circles, etc, this whole incident came back to me and now of course it freaks me out thinking about it.  i was just talking about it today, and we were wishing it had happened during this time of digital cameras.
content.summary: Sound of object/shapes in lawn

content.detailedDescription: At 9:40 pm. from apartment window [open].Spotted 3 glowing orange balls.The size of finger nail at arms lenght.Objects moving west turning and changing formation from diamond to long triangle.Duration of sighting 12-15 seconds.Lost visiual contact when they went over building. estimate altitude of 1000 to1500 feet.No noise or marker lights noticed. pulsing and dancing around as moving. dull glow pumpkin orange color.Made calls to airports for rader information request were denied.No photos were taken due to limited time of sighting.Please contact me desire radar information.
content.summary: 3 glowing orange objects in diamond formation moving n-e spotted. no noise appered pulsing dancing along.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 6:20 pm on november 25, 2005. my ex-wife and i were at the bright
leaf drive-in in mt. airy, north carolina waiting for the movie to start.
we heard a sound in the distance louder than a jet. it sounded like the ocean was in the sky. we looked up and coming from the east was a huge
egyptian pyramid (like the one on the back of the one dollar bill).
it was fling 2000 miles an hour stright towards us. it had the outline of a jelly fish (picture a jelly fish 200 ft high, 500 ft long with a egyptian pyramid inside the front part of it). the pyramid had this outline around it and it pulsated light pink to bright red. this was no human craft of any kind. it stopped to our left and out my driver side window it hung there in the air and did not move, but the outline of the craft (the jelly fish) looked like it was swiming slowly in stationary position with this object. the tintagles of the jelly fish would turn blue
and would make something like electronic sparks. this was somekind of sheild that protected the craft. i looked stright into the pyrimid as it was stopped now and it had indivisual black stones stacked one atop the other. i could see the lines of the stones so clearly. this craft looked just like the one on the back of the one dollar bill, except the cap stone
was connected on this craft. i stared stright into it and and felt the 
presence of something completly evil!!! i tried to get out of the car, but
i could not move nor could she. then all of a sudden this craft started backwards toward the north and it took it less than 30 seconds to completly disappear from our sight. a minute later an air force jet came from the west on the exact same heading that the craft had came in on.
this jet slowed down as it approched the same air space where the craft had been, which told me they had it on radar, because he was fling so slow
he was like "where did it go"? what was it? let me put it this way, bush sr. has said when it comes to ufos "we don't no the half of it". we have all these satelites pointing into space because we are tring to find life somewhere out there in the universe. these ufos are only 25,000 ft off of
the ground here on earth. if they wanted to make contact with us, why don't they just answer air traffic control? if you believe the bible, it makes it very clear. god exists and his angels, the devil exists and his angels, you and i are here and there isn't anybody else according to the bible. do you know why the government is keeping all this a secret?
they have to because the truth cannot be made known until the time appointed. the object that landed in kecksburg, pa in december of 1965,
when the government and nasa reveal what it was, it will be a lie and a
major deception. life on other planets? as long as they can keep you looking into space for that, you can't see what is going on right under your nose.
content.summary: Egyptian piermide with outline of a jelly fish pulsating ligt pink to bright red
